statements: UPDATE ad_performance SET clicks = 200, impressions = 1500 WHERE ad_id = 100;
UPDATE ad_performance SET conversion_rate = 4.75, spend = 500.00 WHERE campaign_id = 200;
UPDATE ad_performance SET clicks = clicks + 10, impressions = impressions + 100 WHERE ad_id = 123 AND campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_performance SET spend = spend - 50.75, conversion_rate = conversion_rate + 0.5 WHERE ad_id = 456 AND campaign_id = 789;
UPDATE ad_performance_data SET clicks = 50, cost_per_click = 3.75 WHERE ad_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE campaign_data SET total_budget = 5000.00, campaign_status = 'active' WHERE campaign_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ad_performance_data SET clicks = 100, impressions = 500 WHERE ad_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE campaign_data SET total_budget = 5000.50, campaign_status = 'active' WHERE campaign_id = '37101464-651a-4c15-8d3a-2202f22792eb';
UPDATE Ads SET clicks = 200, cost = 150.50 WHERE ad_id = 1;
UPDATE Campaigns SET status = 'Inactive', total_budget = 5000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE Ads SET clicks = clicks + 1, cost = cost + 0.5 WHERE ad_id = 123;
UPDATE Campaigns SET status = 'Paused', total_budget = total_budget - 1000.50 WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_performance SET impressions = 500, clicks = 100, conversions = 10 WHERE ad_id = 1;
UPDATE ad SET ad_type = 'Banner' WHERE ad_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_performance SET conversions = 10, clicks = 50 WHERE ad_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign SET end_date = '2022-12-31', campaign_name = 'Holiday Sale' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET budget = 1000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE ad_clicks SET click_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE ad_id = 3
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET budget = 5000, start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ad_costs SET cost_amount = 100.75, cost_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE id = 3;
